website_summaries.verdict: A smart power strip that combines affordability, quality, and dependability.
pros: Equipped with 4 outlets and 4 USB charging ports for charging smartphones, tablets and other gadgets
Comes with built-in leakage and an overload protection switch for added safety
Easy to use right out of the box
cons: Sometimes can be tough to connect to WiFi
Offers less durability than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Love there smart home products.
customer_reviews.text: Okay I love this product, and even though I did not like that it did not show the power usage of the devices plugged in, it is a well-made product that does exactly what they say it will do. This is the second product I have got from Tonbux, but it won't be my last. Not only does the product do exactly what they say they will, but their support is awesome. I have created an attached video review of their product, and on YouTube, I have a review of their smart plug with power management that I really love.
customer_reviews.author: CDW

customer_reviews.title: Good smart strip, okay software
customer_reviews.text: Was easy enough for me to set up, both with the Jinvoo app and Alexa. Can be addressed as one unit or individual plugs, and all be renamed as well as scheduled to turn off and on at certain times (which works consistently). Not terribly cheap construction, though Jinvoo is pretty rough around the edges. I for the life of me have not been able to update the firmware. Even so, the strip still works flawlessly for everything I need from it.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Works with Smart Life App
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is well made and doesn't feel cheap. I like the the black color as it looks sleek. The instructions (which were too small for this old man) pointed to a different app, but I thought I would give it a shot with the Smart Life app since that is the app that nearly everything I have uses, and with a happy surprise it worked! :) It connected quick and easy and worked just like it was supposed to right away without any issues. Glad I chose this Power Strip, and glad I tried the Smart Life App :)
customer_reviews.author: L-

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I want it to!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device because I recently got a Google Home & wanted to add some extra features to my house. Currently I'm using it to control the lights on my Christmas Tree, but I plan on using it for more day to day uses in the future. It was extremely easy to set up, there were step by step instructions that were easy to follow, and I had the strip up and running in no time. The build quality feels nice. It's made of plastic and is pretty lightweight, but doesn't feel like it's going to break on you. Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Grant A.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!  Works "Great"
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking at getting rid of the mechanical timers on my 55g Planted Aquarium. This was recommended. Figured, why not give a go. If not pleased with purchase I have a 30 day window. Thanks Amazon! Anyway. Worked right out of the box. Did take me a bit to set up the "WiFi" stuff mostly downloading the apps on my phone. And then the schedules for all the equipment I needed. As mentioned it is setup on my aquarium. It controls 2 light bars, 1 air pump and a Hue Go. I use the USB's to charge my phone and a wireless keyboard. I normally do not give 5 stars but in this case. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: jmaldo

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly (How to correctly setup)
customer_reviews.text: I realize many people have noted this app does not work, but I feel they have not followed the steps to properly connect the device or are not using a compatible device. I purchased the multi power strip. Step 1. Download the app Jinvoo Smart. 2. Setup Jinvoo account and connect device, going through wifi setup. Once the device is working properly with their app, then proceeded to step 3. On the Alexa app, enable the Jinvoo Smart skill. Step 4. Using Alexa app, search for smart devices. It recognized everything perfectly and flawlessly. Tip, on step 2 prename each outlet to what you are plugging in and Alexa will read those settings.
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio

customer_reviews.title: Must Read.
customer_reviews.text: Original, never worked, never used, never got an answer from the seller, stucked with a piece of junk! Wasted my money and no one ever got back to me. I bought a white one with another link that works good but goes offline once in a while. This black one NEVER WORKED and no one helped me or refunded me or anything.
customer_reviews.author: K Gongora

customer_reviews.title: Resets my LIFX bulbs network connection on each use
customer_reviews.text: When turning on and off the power using the power strip app (not doing anything unusual) my LIFX bulb drops off my network (in the LIFX app) and has to be re-added. I did not have this problem before this power strip. I'm guessing the power comes on over a short period of time instead of instant and this is messing with the light. I would not suggest this power strip if you have smart components plugged into it. Other than that, the power strip has gotten a few firmware updates since I've had it so it doesn't seem like the company will neglect it. I just have the one problem with it
customer_reviews.author: steelew

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty Connecting, Updating, and Using
customer_reviews.text: Connecting often fails and is even mentioned by the seller in the description. Updating fails. I did have it connected, but the automation features never worked. IFTTT app would see it, but the devices never performed their tasks. The only way that I was ever able to control the power ports was when i individually tapped one in the Smart Life software. Even using the automation/scenes in the Smart Life app would report the devices as offline. CHEAP 3RD WORLD JUNK. SPEND THE MONEY FOR SOMETHING RELIABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Rip Shrecker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome even without Alexa or Google home
customer_reviews.text: This is just the outlet you need for life, is so handy and works so good! I have all the USB ports used with my phone charger, razor charger and other usb cords and I also have my computer, speaker and lamp connected to it and is just amazing, it doesn’t take so much space, is actually a good size, is light, I just press the button to turn everything on when I’m using it and off when I’m not using anything, I don’t have google home or Alexa, but just thinking about the idea of using it with it just blows my mind, I just think is awesome 👏
customer_reviews.author: Daniella mendieta plata

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in April 2018 and at first it was working great. I was super happy with the product. Fast forward to July 2018 and it’s completely broken. I only ever plugged 1 (one) item into the power strip which was a basic floor lamp with one light bulb. Wasn’t a high powered one or anything. Unfortunately the return window has passed so now I’m stuck with a piece of junk that is going into the trash. Avoid getting this product at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Just connect the device and that’s all, you don’t need and Alexa to work with
customer_reviews.text: I my God!!!! I do love this item, I think is really helpful because you can turn on / off the smart power strips with your phone. Really easy to use, I just connect the app with my WiFi, I found the device and that’s all, can you believe it ? My boyfriend is super geek and he was nicely surprised about the other devices you can connect through the app Jinvoo smart. We have multiple devices at home like switch for lights, smarty light bulbs and Alexa upstairs and downstairs. I think was a smart decision for us to buy this product. Truly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for wasted hours.
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for about 2 months then suddenly will not connect. Tried AP mode, regular mode, there's 3 devices in the room that can see the network, but this one every time now says the network is unusable and can't connect to the network.
customer_reviews.author: Rahabib/jannaliisaj

customer_reviews.title: Great for saving power on the office computer setup.
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well and was surprisingly easy to setup on the phone and with Alexa. The login ui is a bit weird as it displays your password in plaintext. Once setup with Alexa it is possible to remove the app from your phone and just control everything through Alexa. I was able to group two of the outlets together for my two monitors so they both turn off together, name the other two outlets with my laptop names and then have Alexa turn them on and off as requested along with a nightly turn off of the monitors at night with the 'Turn off all lights' automation.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Helsby

customer_reviews.title: Useful purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this was a pleasure purchase, but is so helpful now. For example, if I arrive late home I can ask my google home to turn on the bed light so when I come in my room is more comfortable for me. Also, was very easy to install with the google home app, another great feature is that you can change the name of the switches to bed light, massager. Whatever you are going to plug in to the strip.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Can be finicky during power outages
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is extremely handy with the ability to set timers for individual sockets and the app allows for on the fly adjustments even when away from home. The app is fairly simple but my biggest complaint is that after a power outage I can be a pain to resync and sometimes you have to start from scratch and redo all of your settings. I am considering connecting this to a UPS (uninterruptible power supply) to mitigate that issue and to maintain power to essential equipment during the event of a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy a better model.
customer_reviews.text: This smart power strip worked okay for a little while but I could never get it to work the outlets independently. All outlets on the power strip were either all on or all off. Made it useless for the purposes I had in mind. Then, after about 6-8 months, it just stopped working completely and I can’t get it to reset or power on at all. Not worth the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on higher draw items.  Maybe only for basic things like light?
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on Keenevo heater for 3d printer bed. Too much current draw? - I can control my two 3d-printers through it, but the heater for the big 3d printer won't even power up the control box. Maybe not proper grounding... maybe it can't handle that much current through the switching circuit? But otherwise its a pretty nifty unit. Great smart phone app and set of features for naming, timers etc. It wouldn't hurt my feelings if there was an physical on/off for switch on the box it self so you don't *have* to go find your phone to manage it.
customer_reviews.author: tlhIn`toq

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, ddin't even last 3 months, Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after slightly more than 2 months of use, and just 10 days after the return window closed. It was pretty easy to use, it's an outlet strip. Meh, it was sort of easy to set up, although I had to time the blue blinks of the LED a couple of times before I got it right. This company emailed me to apologize, and alleged that they would either issue me a refund or send me a replacement. I responded to their email and said I would like a replacement, and I have heard no response.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Laverghetta

customer_reviews.title: Second chance
customer_reviews.text: The initial setup was cumbersome. After 40 some minutes it worked. No problems for a few months, used it with Alexa. Then after an update to the app it stopped working. **After some time and true attention I realized that I had to sync the Jinvoo Smart skill to Alexa again, but I didn't remember the password I had created. Once I addressed that it has been working again.
customer_reviews.author: Russell White

customer_reviews.title: randomly malfunctions after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and just days after the return window closed, they both started suddenly turning off completely at random. Also, the automation via Jinvoo DOES NOT WORK, they turn off but won't turn back on. Also they've begun to draw way more power than they should and now my lamp, that is connected to a separate outlet, flickers every time I turn a port on! I guess the price should have warned me.... DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Z S

customer_reviews.title: Why get a hub when you can get this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is handy as all get out! Hooks up to WiFi via the app incredibly quick. Google Home flawlessly controls whatever you name each port. I was highly skeptical at first bc who can really buy something for $20 something dollars that will directly interface with google home via wifi to allow you to control like 8 switches? This definitely meets that need and allows you to walk around the whole "Hub" hassle
customer_reviews.author: Yo man Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The only thing saving this from a 1-star is the customer service. The initial power strip that I received worked great for several months. Then all of a sudden turned off and would not power back on. I emailed the company, received a replacement. The exact same thing happened again. Worked great for a while, then shut off. Emailed the company again and they issued me a refund. After reading some reviews on other smart power strips, I'm not convinced there's anything much better out there. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: It is heated to a high temperature when I change my iPhone and iPad at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: This device is dangerous to leave unattended because it is heated to a high temperature at which the egg can be fried (I use it for my iPad and iPhone charge). This is the reason why there is no content in all the other benefits of this device. I don't recommend to buy the Smart Power Strip WIFI Plug TONBUX.
customer_reviews.author: Gala

customer_reviews.title: Stopped responding.
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly for the first few months. Now the only way I can get it to respond to the smartphone app or Alexa is to reset it, unplug it for at least 8 hours then plug it back in and add it back to the app. The app will not find it unless it's been unplugged for hours the wifi seems to stop working after it's been on a while. It'll work for ~2 days, then stop responding again. Currently only functions as a conventional power strip with a LOT of LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works with echo dot
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this for my brother-in-law who had a terrible accident and unfortunately cannot get out of bed. My husband was able to easily pair it with an echo dot so that my brother in law can use it to control his devices. He is able to use voice command to turn on his lamp, television and computer without need to ask someone to come and do it for him. It was a simple way to give him a bit of independence for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: febbe

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it linked
customer_reviews.text: Apps leave a lot to be desired. Language problem. Inconsistent terminology. The Jinvoo app called for in the directions couldn't be obtained at Google Play Store as directed in the instructions. Fooled with it for days and couldn't get it to work. I'm sending it back the Covid not withstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Vanghowent

customer_reviews.title: Love love love for moms
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment I’ve made. My son likes to play his Xbox til the wee hours of the night until I got this power strip. It has given me the ability to set him on a schedule for during the week and during the weekend. It has ended all arguments from when I would ask him to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Functional, and Affordable Smart Power Source!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smart power source, we have already gotten a lot of use out of this as we work and travel quite extensively. It is especially handy that each of the four power sources are able to be controlled individually, and was the main reason we were so excited about this model. The USB sources however are all controlled together, but we knew that when we purchased it. This is a very well made strip, and the instructions are top not and easy to follow. Do not hesitate to purchase this if you are on the market for a smart power source.
customer_reviews.author: Asquared

customer_reviews.title: User friendly, great for enforcing rules with kids
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up. The app is very user friendly. Purchased this to remind my kiddos of the rules when it comes to tv/video games and help more easily enforce technology-free time. However, if you have a minor blackout, you will need to double check your app as it may just shut off and keep everything off
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: Another outstanding tool as I begin to convert my dumb home into a smart home
customer_reviews.text: Another outstanding tool as I begin to convert my dumb home into a smart home. Now I can control the light around my home from anywhere. additional this product allows me to use my voice to control a number of devices in my home through Alexa which makes life much easier. Very easy to set and the App easily guides you through connecting the power strip to the internet. This product should definitely be a tool in creating a smart home.
customer_reviews.author: The StreetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I have it under the bed. Two outlets are used for lamps, two for an electric blanket. Alexa, turn on "right lamp," Alexa turn off "left blanket," etc. Very nice to be downstairs and be able to preheat the bed upstairs. Not sure what I'll do when summer comes and the blanket is packed away. In the right application, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: mrag

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a smart plug of any kind. I'm using the power strip for an aquarium, and man this thing makes it easy to manage. I can manually turn on/off individual outlets whenever I want, or I can set whatever schedule I want for times or days of the week to automatically change. It totally replaces the clumsy outlet timers I used for the lighting and the Co2 setup I have running. I will be using this same strip for many other things in the future. Super happy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremyk

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, could use some customization for device "type"
customer_reviews.text: Smarthome was easy to install. Integrated with google voice relatively easily. You can tell it to turn off the entire strip, or each portion individually. (1 for all usb, and 4 individually switched outlets). You can't tell the app (or i haven't found a way to do so) that a "light" is plugged into an outlet-- so if you say "turn off the living room lights" it might not work as expected. Other than that it's been working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Flip

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive device that adds tons of functionality to your work space!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I have it connected to Alexa so that I can separately control my computer power, monitor, desk lamp, and computer speakers with my voice or the Alexa app. The USB ports allowed me to power a lot of my desk devices that don't need data (Echo Dot, smart watch charger, phone chargers, etc.) without taking up USB data ports on my computer. Just remember that it is the power outlets that are "smart," not the USB ports!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. I can plug my laptop charger
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I can plug my laptop charger, chromebook charger and a usb charger all connected and turn on and off everything seperate. The included usb do charge the phone fine. But i have a big phone and want Quick charge so I have another charger. I have this by my bed and its nice setting schedules on each plug. At 11-1am chromebook charger is active then that turns off after a few hours cause I know my chromebook is all charged. The phone app is pretty cool too and flexible naming things. I love it thinking about buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Karli Wills

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but only lasted 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this power strip for about 18 months. Then it just stopped. Turned off and wouldn’t turn on anymore. There is nothing visible that can be opened and changed, like a fuse. I miss using this but am leery about buying another one of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: LMD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I discovered Alexa, I can't get enough of these types of products. Now I can control my bed lamp and the electric blanket with just my voice, which is great because I had surgery and moving can be painful. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the first year, then it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Like the number of ports and options with timers. Worked great for a year and now it won't sync with the required app. Have asked for product support which was quick at first with standard recommendations which i tried but replied that it wasn't working, 4 days later, no reply from vendor.... Have surge protector that won't work any longer...
customer_reviews.author: 78730 cus

customer_reviews.title: Good Smart Surge that died 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: This surge protector lasted about 2 years, for that time it worked as intended and didn't really have any issues, until one day it randomly started to not work, the USB ports would cause it to spaze out and turn off/on randomly. Looking to replace it now.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great power strip!
customer_reviews.text: The WI-FI power strip is great. I was able to organize all my lights, chargers the way I want them to be. It works great with Alexa and it very easy to set up. You can voice control each power outlet and USB ports. The cable is long enough, exactly what I needed. It also looks presentable, so it’s not your another ugly power strip in the house. Overall, I’m very happy I bought it and I will buy another one if I need it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel Cimek

customer_reviews.title: What’s with the App?
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but the app is a totally copy of Smart Things, which is a well known free app that let’s you control not just this product but most others as well. It’s clear they just want your personal information. Typical China.... It’s a great product though just beware of that.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: good surge protector
customer_reviews.text: I use this to power & time the grow lights for my collection of house plants. Sometimes the link between my phone & the product goes wrong & it is a pain to connect them again, but I don't know if that is the fault of the app I am using to control the timer, my wifi, the surge protector itself, or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little over a month ago to plug in all the entertainment devices at my elderly Mothers house. At first it worked great. Then today it stopped working. Anything plugged into it wouldn't turn on it and smelled like something was burning. Which of course terrified an elderly woman who knows nothing about tech stuff, and who was home alone! And of course we can't return it. It's two days past being able to be returned! Will not be buying anything from this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: maverick321

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go behind my row of arcade cabnets, with arcade sign behind them.I hooked this all up with Alexa so I no longer have to reach over cabnets to turn on or off sign.I can turn them all on/off at once without touching anything.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to link to Alexa but works OK.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well-made. The instructions that come with it are microscopic. Very hard to read. I was able to download the App on my smartphone and link it after a few hours of struggle. But since then it seems to work well with our Alexa to turn on and off. Not sure I would buy it for surge protection aspect, I don't think it would protect anything?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clary

customer_reviews.title: This Wifi Smart Power Strip is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Extra electrical outlets and charging ports, all controllable via my Amazon Echo using Alexa. I have a number of electrical items that are always on while plugged in. I wanted to be able to switch them on and off without having having to insert/pull the plug each time I wanted to use them. The USB charging ports are just icing on the cake. Works great with Alexa and I full control of each outlet without having to mess with the plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Streger

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works with Smart Life app that I can connect to Google home. Setup is pretty straightforward and it is very easy to use. I got this to play around with more advanced automation. Since the smart life app also supports IFTTT, I can connect this strip to other services to trigger on/off events. The AC ports can be controlled individually but the USB ports are all turned on/off together. Overall, it is a good product and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a word of caution.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The connection is reliable and voice control works well. With that said, I would exercise caution with these products. This is not UL approved, which will probably not be covered by insurance should a fire happen. I would not plug in high amp utilities like heaters, humidifiers, and things of the like. Stick with basic lamps and charging accessories. If you need to plug in a high amp product, look for a good quality UL approved smart switch from a reputable brand. But if you are sticking to everyday lights and thing alike, this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Indianb0y017

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Smart Power Strip with the right price
customer_reviews.text: Since I got my first Google Home I have been eager to find the best power strip (meaning with quality and price). I have been using this for one month and so far I had no problem with it, it has 4 USB slot, with 4 AC Plugs which I can managed individually using voice command, it also support 110~240 voltage. There was one time it stopped working where I thought it was faulty but there is an update on the software where I just need to update it through the app. I am glad with it and also I liked that it has updates. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Toy For The Lazy
customer_reviews.text: I love this power strip. I use this in my bedroom and i love I control it all with my phone. I can turn off my standing lamp from the comfort of my bed. I can turn all off, on, or pick and choose outlets. It’s great you can name the outlets and this was also a great strip to travel with while I was road tripping for two weeks. With 4 USB and 4 normal outlets, it’s a great addition for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Terrible app
customer_reviews.text: Every time there is an update to the app all of my settings and on/off schedules are completely wiped out. I'm finally fed up with it and am throwing it out. Hopefully, I can find a better option.
customer_reviews.author: HCarleton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: So my device stopped working a few months after i bought it. I LOVED IT. It worked with both Google Home and Alexa. I used both. I was very pleased with the device until it stopped working. They offered to replace the item or give me a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and was really easy to set up everything works right through my Alexa app. I enjoy the fact that each individual plug can be controlled separately and the USB ports are all connected as one. You can name each plug to turn off what you would like to. Great product I would recommend it to anybody good luck on your smart homes and have a great night!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Strip not so reliable but will,do its job
customer_reviews.text: This is a update to my May review. I have lost power 3 times and each time I wind up having to redo everything , assignments,etc Suposedly once the power comes back so should my power strip with retained settings etc. NOT my case . The strip when working does its job just fine which is why I gave it at least 3 stars .
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for, I needed a plug that had many ports and at the same time served with my google home. I love that it connects to my mini google home and I can control it from my cell phone
customer_reviews.author: Yissella More

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and working well
customer_reviews.text: This smart power strip is awesome. I really like how convenience it is. I just downloaded the app on my phone and it connect easily with the device with no issue at all. All done in under 3 minute. Now I can control the power via my phone and don't need to leave my bed. I would recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eong

customer_reviews.title: Great smart power strip
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate in technology convenience. I can now control my outdoor lights and things connected to my outdoor power socket with my phone. This is so convenient. I can even turn on my porch lights when I want from inside or remotely from wherever I am. Having multiple outlets and even USB outlets is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lalit Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Don not trust usb charging ports
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine 2 years ago, but 4 months ago the usb stop working, in fact im quite sure the usb charging ports burns a tablet. Now I dont trust this smart Power trip anymore. Ive Just realized it has 2 year waranty, otherwise I would contact Amazon earlier
customer_reviews.author: Luis Adrian Muñiz

customer_reviews.title: Smart Power Strip Very easy to setup and organize my desk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smart home product. Unlike some of the review indicated, it is actually very easy to connect to wifi. The quality is good. I can organize all the power cables, phone charging lines and many others much better than before. With the remote control, I don't have to come back to the office all the way if I found the lamp is turned on when I am away. Satisfied with its functionality and price.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: Multiple smart plugs in one (Temporary)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing power strip that gives complete control over each spot including the grouping of USB ports Update 1/12/2020 This device now decides to turn off the outlets whenever it wants, you can reset it as many times as you like but it has become a short lived device. NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: If the power flickers (goes out, loses wifi), outlets default to all off
customer_reviews.text: - When an outlet turns off there is an audible click noise. - If the power flickers (goes out, loses wifi), outlets default to all off - Figuring out what china app to use to install it is a hassle That being said, there's not much else better. Don't plug anything you want to always stay on into it. Voice commands and everything else work fine after you've configured it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jiko

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, simple WiFi setup, works with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and was very easy to setup with WiFi in the SmartLife app and with Alexa within minutes. While I was looking for an outdoor version but could not find one I liked, I use this under a large covered patio against the back wall which never gets wet. I use it to charge a phone, plug in an Echo Dot, a USB speaker, and plan to use it for decorative lights around the holidays. I'll likely get another one for the media room.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Item failure
customer_reviews.text: Should have tried it when I purchased it. Bought it in a flash sale and was excited. Waited for the perfect place for it(found it). Plugged everything in (6 items) Nothing!! Moved it to other places and still nothing. I can't even return it. Frustration!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good smart power strip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to run a TV, PS4, and a few other media devices in my basement. The app works just fine - Alexa support is good. My kids are the primary people using the devices in the basement. They have a bad habit of not turning devices off. I can now remotely turn the devices off from my bedroom. I can also kill the power if they are being cut off from devices. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Steakman

customer_reviews.title: and the other control your home via smart mode. It took me sometime setting up Wi-Fi ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat power strip. There's so much you can do with this, one being that you can charge your devices via usb port, and the other control your home via smart mode. It took me sometime setting up Wi-Fi as this is my first time. I realized that the "Smart Life" App should be set up first before setting up the Amazon Alexa. They do provide nice instructions to set this up!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Helpful around the house depending on how you use it
customer_reviews.text: Set up for this was not very hard and it paired with Alexa once it was on my network. I like it, however... The software for this is jank. It seems really sketchy. You are required to enter your phone number in order to use it and set up an account. They say its for security purposes, but Im pretty sure they could do it another way.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Carew

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome add-on to my work station. This smart power strip has 4 3-prong outlets and 4 USB outlets which are plenty for me power all my devices. Now I can control the desk lamb and other appliances with just one click through the Jinvoo Smart app, which is also easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tramduc0_0

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This strip was great WHEN it worked but it died completely a little over a year after buying it. Not to mention it would randomly reset causing us to have to reconnect everything in order to use it. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: Great power strip
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good size has many outlets to connect different devices and also have extra USB port. It has a bottom to turn in on and off and so far happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Quirola

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 different kind of WiFi smart outlets few weeks ago. All of them working good so far. The good think about this strip is I can sparely to control the outlets and usbs ( see the screenshots that I post) i can easily connect it with GOog*l app.m, make my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: YvetteC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Great product have been using if since I received it. It works great. It’s really easy to use and the iPhone software to control it is easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Zamora

customer_reviews.title: ... are slowly trying to make our house into a smart home. We have a bunch of outlets done ...
customer_reviews.text: We are slowly trying to make our house into a smart home. We have a bunch of outlets done already, but wanted a charging station for our electronics. This is perfect for that. We also have one of our living room lights hooked up to it. What we like is using our phones to turn the light on via the phone. My kids enjoy telling Alexa to turn on the light. Overall, we are really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Schonmann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use - very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this outlet to use in conjunction with an Alexa enabled robot, Vector from Anki. Set up was easy and it worked on our very first try. We integrated it into the Alexa app and can use the outlet either with the app or through Vector the robot. If you want to see it in action, search our YT channel for Alexa and you will find the video. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: SJ Gaming Boys

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but is it really 110/240v?
customer_reviews.text: Good product. After downloading Jinvoo Smart Home app from Google Play, setup is really easy and works without complaints. I would like to use it in a country that use 220v and in the box specifies that it uses 110/240v, BUT in the back of the power strip only 120v (if any from support service read this, please confirm the double voltage use, or if it has a security fuse inside)
customer_reviews.author: radioterapeuta

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These work great with our echo dots! I bought these for my husbands entertainment systems I. The living room and our master bedroom. You can program the plugs and usb’s Separately! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This is my second smart power plug. It was quick to set up and link with Alexa. My only complaint is the size of the included instruction booklet. It’s microscopic and difficult fo see even with my reading glasses. PLEASE INCREASE THE SIZE OF THE INSTRUCTION BOOKLET FOR THOSE OF US WITHOUT SUPERIOR EYESIGHT!!
customer_reviews.author: dhall

customer_reviews.title: Functions as advertised and works well with Alexa too
customer_reviews.text: The strip did everything I thought it could do. I named the ports and hooked it up to Alexa very easily. My biggest problem is finding more things to plug into it :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Works so well with Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could connect it with my Alexa and it exceeded my expectations! The usb ports come in handy when I am trying to charge all of my electronics and I have my fan and lights connected through the app. Everything works flawlessly and I absolutely love this power strip!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Great value
customer_reviews.text: We needed another extension cord and wanted one that could also charge are phones and work with alexa. Being able to name each plug is great since i cant keep my phone charging or keep something on but also have the light turned off
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Purchased in March and now doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in March. Loved it, and now it doesn't work and it's out of it's return window. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Cgrazer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price, minus a few setup issues
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is a good price, however it was a pain in the rear to get on my wifi network. I probably had to go through the process and procedure like 8 times. If I remember correctly, the problem may have been my password being too long on my main wifi networks. I think I had to add it to my guest network.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Uploaded a video of this working with Alexa, very useful power strip, each outlet is controlled separately or all together which ever you choose. You can also name the outlets for Alexa to control.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Works every time
customer_reviews.text: The material quality feels kinda cheap but nothing broken works perfectly. Set up was a pain because instructions that it came with were short and a little hard to read. Overall it is an awesome power strip. I use it in my reef tank as a simple controller. When I go to feed or do water changes I’m able to turn off all my pumps and skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Other smart plugs don't have this problem so will probably have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described but there is a major problem. If power is lost and then restored the default state is off instead of the previously scheduled condition. Other smart plugs don't have this problem so will probably have to return it and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: TShooter21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Products!
customer_reviews.text: This Tonbux smart surge protector is so AMAZING, that we also bought Tonbux smart switches for our Kitchen light, Office light, Bathroom light and Garage light! Thank You, Tonbux!
customer_reviews.author: SJS

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I had a bit of issues receiving this (not amazons fault, but usps) This works flawlessy. I currently have it conncted with my TV, Lamp, And 3 Chargers. It is Alexa Compatiable and i have never had an issue with this. It is being sold for a AMAZING price point and it gets the job done. I highly recommend and Alexa user to purchase, you will not regret this.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: works great but use Smart Life app for setup.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with A less. Sets up using Smart Life app. Had no problems with setup, don't even download their app, use Smart Life. Alexa Smart Home will find the power strip and all the plugs and ports after Smart Life setup. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Danz

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install, so simple
customer_reviews.text: Above and beyond expectations. I have four now, plan on buying more. I use strip lighting and sparkle projectors to set moods. Now I can leave them all plugged in and just ask Alexa to turn on whatever I want..Also use to control electronic components so they are not on when not in use, with noticeable lowering of energy bill.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these I love that you can easily set up and program on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Idanes Font

customer_reviews.title: Slow charge
customer_reviews.text: Charges very slowly. I can charge my phone all night and still not be fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: chiphind

customer_reviews.title: great if it work out of box
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be decent when I first opened the box. However, it turned out to be a huge disappointment when I realized it was actually not working when plugged in. The power bottom supposed to light up but it didn't. had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: That’s what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this smart power strip. It comes with 4 USB ports that’s perfect for all my devices. Also setup was easier than I expected. Simply turn of any of one. I think USB ports are all connected. But outlet you can control each one of it. Nice smart strip.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS REN

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get a charge into things.
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger, I can plug in both my iPad and my Kindle with ease. It charges my electronics quickly and without overheating things. I ordered a second one almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Love it because I don't have to turn it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it because I don't have to turn it on and off. I can do that from Alexa or my I Phone. Really great first thing in the morning. I live in a two story house so you can turn on the down stair light from the bed.
customer_reviews.author: retiredhtc

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday for use out on my deck. Was using a couple of Smart Plugs to control my fountain and balcony lights. Setup was easy and quick. Controls the plugs well so far. One feature that my smart plug had that I will have to do some looking around on this is a on\off timer. Not a real breaker here but good product
customer_reviews.author: Rich Orr

customer_reviews.title: best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. This is the second one I have bought. Now that winter is coming I can turn on my electric fireplace on my way home from work and it will be nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I lost the packaging material before setting it up, and it was not easy to find out online which app I need to download to use it. (Smart Life on Google Play store) The red main power indicator can be a bit too bright at night. Once set up, it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lambda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome surge strip with great smart features
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the $, ordered 2 more. Doesn't provide power usage but I didn't buy it for that. Works great with Alexa and Google. Easy setup and configuration. To answer a question I recently read on this item, it does NOT have mounting holes on the back.
customer_reviews.author: ParaTech

customer_reviews.title: It's a great power strip, but the app is bloatware/adware
customer_reviews.text: works great as a power strip, just don't count on using the provided app if you value your device not being bogged down.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Foster

product_meta.title: Smart Power Strip WiFi Plug TONBUX Multiple Outlet Surge Protector USB Bar & FCC Certified Remote Control Timing Schedule Voice Control with Alexa Echo Google Home IFTTT Black
feature_bullets: ►Work with Alexa Echo: Work with Amazon Alexa Echo to control each of the outlets individually Via voice control after connecting the Smart app successfully. Plug the smart power strip in the socket, Turn on/off your devices based on specific time you set for energy saving with the wifi intelligent power strip. (Make sure the power strip device has been turned on rather than in shutdown status.)

►4 AC Outlets + 4 USB Charging Ports: Equipped with 4 outlets and 4 USB charging port for travel, home or office, provide a convenient power supply for notebooks and other Tabs Socket. And you can remote control your indoor lights, space heaters, fans, and other appliances at the same time.( NOTE: the 4 Outlet can be controlled individual ;4 USB ports are controlled as a one unit)

►Free App Control: Connect to your 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network and Download the Smart APP ( IOS 9.0 or above/Android 6.0 or above) on your smart device and pair with Amazon Alexa using on Apple store/Android Market/ GooglePlay. Support ONLY 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network

►Energy Saving & Safety: Remote control your daily electrical equip with Security via Voice Control when you are indoor. Built in leakage, overload protection switch, product support Surge Protection, effective absorption of the sudden huge energy, protect the connection equipment from damage

►Our Support Guarantee: If you encounter any problem or need further support, please feel free to contact us through E-mail: support@tonbux.com or Amazon directly. Please note that support ONLY 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network and make sure your APP version is always the newest. IOS 9.0 or above/Android 6.0 or above is supported.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars454 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
